scripts.cli: tsup && node dist/index test:start --url=https://www.google.com --description='Test the search bar'
scripts.cli2: tsx src/interfaces/cli/index.ts test:start --url=https://www.google.com --description='Test the search bar'
scripts.cli3: tsc && node --loader ts-node/esm dist/interfaces/cli/index.js test:start --url=https://www.google.com --description='Test the search bar'
